# intro

## setup enviroment
### install packages and set directories
```{r}
# install packages
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)

# set dir
current_dir <- getwd()
project_dir <- current_dir %>% 
  str_replace("src", "")
data_dir <- paste(project_dir, "data/", sep = "")
```

# preparing the data

## data sources
### import data
```{r}
data_weight <- read.csv(paste(data_dir, "weightLogInfo_merged.csv", sep = ""))
glimpse(data_weight)
head(data_weight)
tail(data_weight)
```
